thread.title: Philip Elworthy

author: Philip Elworthy
title: Philip Elworthy
text:
The whole transaction went very smoothly, from ordering online, to receiving fitting times by email, and paying after fitting was completed. The fitters arrived early having first phoned to tell me. They were extremely polite and most efficient.
I recommend the company very highly and will use them again. Two technicians arrived and changed 4 tyres in just 40 minutes.
